summary.span: 表示 的資料行行首。

span.span: Represents a column header for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件是衍生自一個按鈕控制項。A object is a button control that is derived from . 滑鼠事件和資料行的調整大小，持續追蹤的屬性。 properties keep track of mouse events and the resizing of columns. 資料行中的標頭檢視模式是物件。Column headers in a view mode are objects. 您可以自訂使用各種不同的屬性在這個類別和相關類別中找到的物件。You can customize objects by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes. 如需有關這些屬性，以及它們之間的優先順序的詳細資訊，請參閱[GridView 資料行行首樣式和範本概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). A是，這表示它可以包含任何類型 （例如字串、 影像或工作面板） 的單一物件。A is a , which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. ## Examples 每個可以包含操作 （右鍵） 功能表。Each can contain a context (right-click) menu. 下列範例示範如何建立的內容功能表在 XAML 中。The following example shows how to create a context menu for a in XAML. [!code-xaml[ListViewCode#HeaderContextMenu](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml#headercontextmenu)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此實作會處理事件 (發生時中的屬性設定為`true`)。This implementation handles the event (which occurs when the property in the is set to `true`). 它也會結束所設定的滑鼠捕捉方法。It also ends the mouse capture that was set by the method. 這可讓以支援拖放作業，它會將資料行。This provides a way for the to support the drag-and-drop operation that moves a column. 這個方法會設定事件引數`true`。This method sets the event argument to `true`.

span.span: Provides class handling for the event that occurs when the user moves the mouse within a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此實作會處於已按下狀態時的滑鼠左的按鈕拖放作業移動。This implementation keeps the left mouse button in a pressed state while a is moved by a drag-and-drop operation. 這也會導致的屬性保持設定為`true`當按下使用其滑鼠左鍵滑鼠移開標頭。This also causes the property of the to remain set to `true` when the mouse with its left mouse button pressed moves off the header. 此實作會保留事件引數設定為`false`for事件，讓方法可支援拖放作業，它會將資料行。This implementation keeps the event argument set to `false` for the event so that the method can support the drag-and-drop operation that moves a column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會執行中的欄標頭配置，並將其他資料行的標頭放在結尾新增空間。The class performs layout for the column headers in a and places an additional column header at the end to add space. A的值識別在這個資料行行首。A value of identifies this column header in the . A的值識別為目前物件的拖放作業的資料行。A value of identifies a column that is currently the object of a drag-and-drop operation. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
